digital_sticker.description: The core visual element. A digital twin of the physical sticker.
digital_sticker.style: Aspect ratio 1:1 or card format. Must use the 'sticker_hologram' gradient overlay. Contains QR code, Plate Number, and Expiry Date clearly.

landing_hero.alt: Busy street in Niamey showing diverse vehicles

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on solid backgrounds to reduce 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide-React. Stroke width 1.5px for elegance. 2px for active states.
visual_enhancers.motion: Use Framer Motion for page transitions. 'EaseOut' curves. Staggered entrance for dashboard lists.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text on Orange/Green backgrounds is White. Text on light backgrounds must be Slate-900.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-[#E05D26] on all interactive elements.
accessibility.text_scaling: Support up to 200% text zoom without breaking layout.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Configure Tailwind theme with the specific colors provided.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar (Admin) vs Navbar (Citizen) logic.
4. Build the 'DigitalSticker' component early - it is the heart of the app.
5. Use the provided image URLs for the respective pages. Do not use placeholders.
6. Ensure the 'Police Scanner' view is high-contrast and works in bright sunlight (Light mode default).
7. Implement the 'Wizard' pattern for the Sticker Purchase flow (Step 1: Vehicle, Step 2: Owner, Step 3: Payment).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
